body.p:
Kenton Co.
PROVOST MARSHAL'S OFFICE,
6th DISTRICT OF KENTUCKY.
Covington, Ky. Novr 21st 1863
Governor

I hope to get your consent to order the entire Military in each County to the Court Houses of the different Counties on different days, when the appointed recruiting officers with as many recruits as they may have, will appear in U. S Uniform with music &c
If you consent please answer and I will fix the days &c. I have ten Counties in my District

Your Obt Servt
G. W. Berry
Capt & Pro Mar 6th D Ky

Hon Thos Bramlette
Governor of Ky
Frankfort
Ky
